title: When is 3v3 ranked coming out
body: If anyone could give me an idea of when 3v3 ranked is coming out because my understanding was that it was meant to be up within a year of the oce servers being up?

replies.body: Probably never on OCE, which sucks. We only rarely get that map anyway.

Can't find anything recent, but it is unlikely to come out anytime soon.
[Here is the most recent comment from a Rioter (5 months ago).](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZoOOIpc2-3v3-ranked-twisted-treeline?comment=0008)

If anything changes, it will be put on the [queue schedule post. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZzQR1haM-queue-schedule-updated?show=flat&page=5)
